Overview

Learn how to build your website with boba!

We're Still Building This Page!

Please come back soon.

View on Github.

Quick Start

Here's a template to help you get started

Hello World

boba is the best! 

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
	<meta charset="utf-8">
	<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
	<title>Build with Boba!</title>
	<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/COMINGSOON">
  </head>
  <body>
	<section class="section">
	  <div class="container">
		<div class="row">
		  <div class="col">
			<h1 class="header">
			  Hello World
			</h1>
			<h3 class="subheader thin">
			  boba is the best!
			</h3>
		  </div>
		</div>
	  </div>
	</section>
  </body>
</html>
